item.name: Receivables Customer Account Activities
Receivables Customer Account Activities/{AccountId}/Child/Credit Memo Applications/{ApplicationId}/Child/Credit Memo Application Dff
Get a credit memo application descriptive flexfield

You can use these queryable attributes to filter this collection resource using the q query parameter:
  • ActivityName; string; The name of the credit memo activity for a REST service.
  • ApplicationId; integer; The identifier of the credit memo application against a transaction for a REST service.
  • ApplicationStatus; string; The value that identifies the application status of an activity on a credit memo for a REST service.
  • CreditMemoId; integer; The identifier of the credit memo for a REST service.
  • CreditMemoNumber; string; The number of the credit memo for a REST service.
  • CreditMemoStatus; string; The status of the credit memo application for a REST service.
  • IsLatestApplication; string; The value that identifies whether the activity is the latest application on a credit memo for a REST service. Valid values are Y and N.
  • ReferenceInstallmentId; integer; The identifier of the transaction installment that the credit memo is applied against for a REST service.
  • ReferenceTransactionId; integer; The identifier of the transaction that the credit memo is applied against for a REST service.
  • ReferenceTransactionNumber; string; The number of the transaction that the credit memo is applied against for a REST service.
  • ReferenceTransactionStatus; string; The status of the transaction that the credit memo is applied against for a REST API. Valid values are Open and Closed.
  • TransactionType; string; The credit memo application transaction type for a REST service.

The default value is "asc".  For example, ?orderBy=field1:asc,field2:desc

Used as a predefined finder to search the collection.

Format ?finder=<finderName>;<variableName>=<variableValue>,<variableName2>=<variableValue2>

The following are the available finder names and corresponding finder variables

  • CreditMemoApplicationsFinder Finds credit memo application details using the finder attributes specified.
    Finder Variables
    • ApplicationLimitByDays; integer; The number of days past the credit memo application date to consider it for inclusion in the credit memo applications inquiry for a REST API. The default value is 90 days.
    • CreditMemoStatus; string; The status of the credit memo to consider for inclusion in the credit memo applications inquiry for a REST API. Valid values are Open and Closed.
    • ReferenceTransactionStatus; string; The status of the reference transaction to consider for inclusion in the credit memo applications inquiry for a REST API. Valid values are Open and Closed.
  • PrimaryKey Finds credit memo applications using the finder attributes specified.
    Finder Variables
    • ApplicationId; integer; The unique identifier of the credit memo application against a transaction for a REST service.
